t: Dwell (magazine) - Wikipedia
s: March 15, 2025 - In August 2002, Jacobs left the magazine and was replaced by senior editor Allison Arieff. After Arieff, Sam Grawe held the position from 2006 to 2011, followed by Amanda Dameron from 2011 to 2017. William Hanley became the editor-in-chief in 2019. In January 2020, it was announced that Zach Klein would be taking over as Dwell's CEO. In summer 2016, Dwell relaunched as a community publishing platform. In late 2016, the brand announced Modern ...

t: New Branding & Packaging Design for Modern by Collins — BP&O
s: February 28, 2023 - It is a collaborative project between design and architecture magazine Dwell, designers Chris Deam and Nick Dine of Deam+Dine, and the American retailer Target. The range features over 120 products. From chairs, tables and glassware to kitchen utensils, bowls and cocktail shakers.
